title: 'It was time to speak' - Haaland defends comments over Dortmund 'pressure'
shortDescription: Erling Haaland says it is time to "move on" from comments he made earlier this month where he said Borussia Dortmund were pressuring him to make a decision on his future.

title: Mali vs Equatorial Guinea- Latest score
shortDescription: Follow all the action as Mali face Equatorial Guinea in the last 16 at AFCON. Watch live on Sky Sports Premier League.

title: Salah scores after Bailly miss as Egypt edge Ivorians on pens
shortDescription: Mohamed Salah scored Egypt's winning penalty after Eric Bailly missed for Ivory Coast in a dramatic shoot-out following a 0-0 draw in the African Cup of Nations last-16.

title: Infantino comments on African migrants 'completely unacceptable'
shortDescription: FIFA president Gianni Infantino's comments about African migrants have been described as "completely unacceptable" by Kick It Out chief executive Tony Burnett.

title: Manchester derby, Liverpool vs Man Utd live on Sky Sports in March
shortDescription: The Manchester derby plus Liverpool vs Man Utd are among the Premier League fixtures to be shown live on Sky Sports in March.

title: Aubameyang left out of Arsenal squad for Dubai training camp
shortDescription: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has been left out of Arsenal's squad for their training camp in Dubai and will instead remain in London to keep up his fitness.

title: Police investigate alleged racist abuse of Stoke player
shortDescription: West Midlands Police are investigating allegations that a Stoke City player was racially abused before Tuesday's Championship match against Coventry City.

title: Newcastle agree £30m Guimaraes fee | Toon target Brighton's Burn
shortDescription: Newcastle have agreed a fee with Lyon in the region of £30m to sign midfielder Bruno Guimaraes and are also targeting a deal to sign Brighton defender Dan Burn.

title: Four positive Covid tests needed as PL agrees new postponement guidance
shortDescription: Premier League clubs have agreed on new guidance that says teams will have to show four positive COVID-19 cases in order to apply to have a match called off.

title: Rangers condemn racist abuse of Ofoborh
shortDescription: Rangers have condemned the "disgraceful" racist abuse sent to Nnamdi Ofoborh as he streamed himself playing games online.

title: Chelsea vs Spurs in WSL rearranged for March 23, live on Sky
shortDescription: Chelsea vs Tottenham in the Women's Super League has been rearranged for Wednesday, March 23, live on Sky Sports.

title: Pereira favourite to be named Everton boss | Lampard remains leading contender
shortDescription: Former Porto boss Vitor Pereira now favourite to be appointed next Everton manager following further talks, as Frank Lampard remains a leading contender for the job.

title: Papa John's Trophy: Arsenal U21 crash out; Wigan, Rotherham advance
shortDescription: Sky Bet League One leaders Wigan continued their fine form as they advanced to the semi-finals of the Papa John's Trophy with a 1-0 win at the DW Stadium on Tuesday.

title: Newcastle giving up hope on Lingard | Carlos holding out for deal
shortDescription: Newcastle United have all but given up hope of signing Jesse Lingard on loan from Manchester United.
